item.title: Tim add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Tim add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Tim add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "People say that what we’re all seeking is a meaning for life. I don’t think that’s what we’re really seeking. I think that what we’re seeking is an experience of being alive, so that our life experiences on the purely physical plane will have resonances with our own innermost being and reality, so that we actually feel the rapture of being alive." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Tim add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "The experience of eternity right here and now is the function of life. Heaven is not the place to have the experience; here is the place to have the experience." -- Joseph Campbell
